name: MinosMaze - The Minotaur's Labyrinth
description: Theseus is locked in Minotaur's labyrinth, help him escape!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel or AMD 2GHz Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB VRAM (Shader Model 3) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
